sentences.sentence: While the two men, who had at last approached each other, were conversing, grandmama walked over to the grove.
sentences.translation: 两个人终于走到一起，他们在谈话的时候，奶奶向小树林走去。

sentences.sentence: It may surprise you that conversing with strangers will make them happier too.
sentences.translation: 与陌生人交谈也会让他们更快乐，这可能会让你感到惊讶。

sentences.sentence: We spend a large part of our daily life talking with other people and, consequently, we are very accustomed to the art of conversing.
sentences.translation: 我们在日常生活中花了大量的时间与他人交谈，因此，我们非常熟悉交谈的艺术。
